mapper.select: select cart_idx, `name` p_name, id, TB_PRODUCT.serial_num, ea, price eaPrice, cart_date from TB_CART, TB_PRODUCT where TB_CART.serial_num = TB_PRODUCT.serial_num and id=#{id}

select cart_idx, `name` p_name, id, TB_PRODUCT.serial_num, ea, price eaPrice, cart_date from TB_CART, TB_PRODUCT where TB_CART.serial_num = TB_PRODUCT.serial_num and cart_idx=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BUY(id, serial_num, ea, state_num, rec_name, phone, post, main_addr, sub_addr, se_phone, comment, add_comment, pay_option, buynum) values(#{id}, #{serial_num}, #{ea}, #{state_num}, #{rec_name}, #{phone}, #{post}, #{main_addr}, #{sub_addr}, #{se_phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment}, #{add_comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_option}, #{buynum})
mapper.update: update TB_USER set point=#{point} where id=#{id}
